ValidationRule.description: A Company Cancellation Request can not be set to Approved until certain fields are populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi-Company Cancellation Request', OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Approved') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Closed') ), ISBLANK( PGi_Company__c ) || ISBLANK( Effective_Date__c ) || ISPICKVAL( ServicePlanType__c,'') || ISBLANK( TCV__c ) || ISBLANK( ofLicenses__c ) || ISBLANK( Term__c ) || ISBLANK( DateofCancellationNotice__c ) || ISBLANK( ContractEffectiveDate__c ) || ISPICKVAL( ETFApply__c ,'') || ISPICKVAL( ContractRenewalTerm__c ,'') || ISPICKVAL( ReasonforCancellation__c ,'') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to set as Approved, the following fields must be populated: PGi Company, Effective Date, Service Plan Type, TCV, # of Licenses, Term, Date of Cancellation, Effective Termination Date, ETF Apply, Contract Renewal Term, and Reason for Cancellation
